thread.title: Crystal Watkins
thread.title_full: Public Storage reviewed by Crystal Watkins

author: Crystal Watkins
title: Crystal Watkins
text: The customer service I received from CeCe was great. She was very well spoken and took me through the process step by step. The buildings are another story. The paint is peeling in the unit, there is one building that looks like someone backed the uhaul truck into and hasn't been fixed. The facility needs an update. Even the gate is old and rusty.
